ModMetaData.name: Save Our Ship 2 Enemy Ship Extension: StarSector
ModMetaData.author: Antisodium
ModMetaData.description:
增添了太空战斗游戏“远行星号”中的几艘舰船，作为“拯救飞船2”中的敌舰出现。你甚至可以在RimWorld里玩远行星号！
Addition of several enemy ships from space battle game StarSector, for Save Our Ship 2 ship battle. Now you can play StarSector in RimWorld!
